quoteText:
JAN is committed to ensuring that its site is accessible to all users. The JAN Website conforms to existing recommendations and standards.

Accessibility

JAN attempts to make its information accessible to all individuals, including individuals who use assistive technology. First and foremost, JAN's Website is designed to accommodate individuals with cognitive, motor, and sensory limitations. Alt-text tags, captioning, and other features identify images or their functions.
title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies
